title: quite cul-da sac Fully Furnished few blocks from Littleton rail
posting_body: Charming Fully Furnished House in Old Little ton front RV Parking.
Only 4 other houses in this Cul-da-sac.
With 45' RV parking space in front.
The large RV space NOT for living in for parking storage only.
You can plug in with battery tenders to keep batteries fully charged.
with $5000 Security on two year minimum deal.
If you don't need the RV parking space the Landlord will store his Diesel Pusher there and you can subtract $500 from monthly rent.
Also can subtract $500/mo.
if you don't need the 2 car garage
Tenant pays all utilities .
Very large driveway.
Parking for 4 cars and 2 additional.
New full size stackable washer and dryer in 2nd bedroom and New massive triple access Stainless Steel Frig.
All of the detective accessories will go with us that are in the pictures to furniture and 3 HD LED TV will remain for new tenants enjoyment with 3 remotes.
No Cats But small dogs OK.
Landlord will keep his office and storage room on the back part of the property both have a separate entry and will not have to bother tenants in anyway for access.
Call JDV 720 35seven 202nine
ALL OF FURITURE AND 3  TVS ALL INCLUDED.
IF YOU HAVE ALL OF YOUR OWN STUFF BE HAPPY TO RENT THIS HOUSE EMPTY
BUT THE RENTAL RATE WOULD BE THE SAME.
